00034 #ifndef CFILESESS_H
00035 #define CFILESESS_H
00036 
00037 #include "csess.h"
00038 
00048 class cfilesess : public csess {
00049         protected:
00050                 std::string base, err, id, sid;
00051 
00053 
00054                 std::string tohex( const std::string & );
00055                 std::string tohex( const char *, unsigned );
00057                 std::string crtid(); 
00058                 std::string sessfn(const std::string &); 
00059 
00060         public:
00061                 cfilesess( const std::string & );
00062                 ~cfilesess() {}
00063                 std::string getid() { return sid; }
00064                 bool valid( const std::string & );
00065                 bool setval( const std::string &, const struct timeval & );
00066                 bool getval( const std::string &, struct timeval &);
00067                 bool setval( const std::string &, const std::string & );
00068                 bool setval( const std::string &, const char *, unsigned );
00069                 bool getval( const std::string &, char *, unsigned );
00070                 bool getval( const std::string &, char **, unsigned & );
00071                 bool getval( const std::string &, std::string & );
00072                 bool setval( const std::string &, bool );
00073                 bool getval( const std::string &, bool & );
00074                 bool rmval( const std::string & );
00075                 bool setval( const char *n, const char * str ) 
00076                         { return setval((std::string)n, (std::string) str); }
00077                 bool rm();
00078                 bool open( const std::string & );
00079                 bool create( std::string & );
00080                 const char *errmsg();
00081                 const char *dir() {
00082                         return id.c_str();
00083                 }
00084 };
